service.name: Bereavement Allowance
service.description: Breavement Allowance (BVA) is a short term income support payment to help customers after the death of their partner. It is generally payable for a 14 week period from the date the partner died. BVA can be claimed where either the claimant or the deceased was not receiving a social security pension or benefit at the time of death.

Dimension.name: Centrelink
Dimension.desc: Delivering a range of payments and services for people at times of major change.

Dimension.name: Human Services
Dimension.desc: We deliver social and health-related payments and services
